values:
i went to school late today...very late...i got there about the end of 4th period..hehe...then i went to 5th 6th and 7th and then i left...i went to vinnys for a bit and then i went home...

my sister thinks im gross because i eat whip cream by itself...haha...its not gross its good...

<3

i havent written in a while...i kinda just got caught up with my xanga...im not really into the whole lj thing...but its cool...someone persuaded me to start writing in here again...
       yesterday...i went to school...blah...then rob picked up me eddy miguel and this chick linda and we met up with zack at my house...it was a party...there was like 7 people in the garage...charles came too...then i was with jamie and charles while waiting for amy to come over...she brought her little brother so fabe could teach him to skate...so me amy and ryan walked over to fabes house and then to the park...on the way there there was this group of kids...all little boys abou tlike 14 to 15 years old...they started talking shit...whistling...shit like that...amy got really scared...it was funny...amy and i came back to my house and we ate...and then me joey amy ryan fabe and rick were in the garage...then they all left...it was a good day...
       one thing that i knew was going to happen was that fabe was going to like amy...i even told rick that...they other thing ive come to realize is now that i introduced fabe to amy hes going to call her...he calls her more than me where before he called me more then her...it doesnt really bother me that they like eachother...ive been down that road before and we didnt get far...so im not going to waste my time on someone who doesnt want a relationship with me...but it just makes me feel like he doesnt really have to bother with me anymore now that he has amy...i dont know how to explain it...but o well shit happens...it happens to people everyday....some people take it differently then others...you just have to learn to cope with it...
       i saw her yesterday...i had so much fun just talking to her...i wanted to kiss her right there and then but there was to many people around....and plus im afraid if i do she might turn away or something and i wil be rejected...
       well im off...im gonna go party and finish up my physics homework thats due tomorrow...im gonna have fun today...supposed to be hanging out with joey...i dont know what im going to do after though...prolly just work on my paper...even though i have all weekend....

<3

well when i woke up today i started reading the book i borrowed from amy...stayed in my room most of the day and just relaxed and read...it was great im almost finished with the book only 10 pages left...

i had to leave the house for a while i had to go pick out my classes...i havent gotten my schedule yet...maybe wednesday or thursday...i saw michelle today and her mom...apparently she has been attending washington since freshman year...i guess thats cool...they both told my mom and i horrible stories about how girls are mean to her daughter but im sure her daughter is no angel..

i want some chocolate...i have a taste for some i dont know why...i wanna make some desert but i dont know what kind...and i dont have eggs so i cant make cake or cupcakes...

after i finish reading cut im going to read the things they carried by time obrien...its supposed to be real good...but for now i think im off to the store...i want some chocolate...

<3

well last night went great...we tried to get in the movies to see hide and seek but you have to be 17 with a valid id and me and nick dont have ids...so we went to the mall anyways...walked around...ate a pretzel...went to jimmys...had fun...loads...im glad i can still go over there and have fun...

well lets just say im very dissappointed in the way you acted on the phone last night...it wasnt very lady like...but o well...all i can say is it was never a real friendship because you werent the real friend...when i needed you the most you took me home so fuck you...you have to be in control and guess what you werent with me...and i pity the next person you befriend and just hope they arent as "weak" as i am...or you are...but whatever doesnt bother me none so have a great life...im sure youll need that...

well yesterday went pretty well...went to volleyball and then back to amys...we went on a mission last night with an apple...it ws great...we pulled it off....lol!!  well i stayed at her house and talked to people on her buddylist...while she feel asleep...and then i fell asleep...then this morning amy was like attacking her sisters...it was scary and cute in the same way...i brought her a cupcake too...they were so good...im the best cook ever!!!!!

i had to go to francis today...clean out my locker...saw some people i really didnt want to see and saw some people im really going to miss...funny thing jasmina was all like  i didnt know you had a xanga...and i thought maybe she herad what had happened with my old one and i was like "how the hell do you know"  she was like i was looking on my computer and saw yours so i gave her my new name...hopefully shell comment...

well i was at amys online and this chick imed me told me her name was tammy and that she went to brooks but she doesnt know amy...i thought that was weird...everyone i know who goes to brooks knows amy...anywho...well she imed me again later on when i was at home and i asked what her xanga name was...and she was like i have to tell you the truth...and i was like ok...and she told me her name wasnt tammy and that she didnt go to brooks...i got really scared and thought that whoever it was was going to bust out with "i gave your xanga in bitch"...well to my surprise she didnt but she did tell me she goes to francios and her bf is lewis so thats when i knew who it was...i never really talked to her in school but she said she noticed me around and i was like o...i was kinda freaked out because i was thinking maybe she was stalking me or something but then i remembered how i met jose and how long i noticed him before i actually talked to him and i thought...hey maybe me and this chick can be friends or something...dont worry i dont think shes weird anymore and i dont think shes stalking me either...so its ok...

nick and kyle are on their way over all of us and amy are going to go to the movies to see hide and seek...im so excited...its a scary movie...well its supposed to be...we are going to get the tickets early and then either hang out at the mall or go to jims...dont know yet...i just hope if we go to jims that everything will be ok because i really dont feel like talking about anything...im in a good mood right now and i dont want it to be ruined...

<3

well i had to meet with school today with my mom...when we got there they whipped out my xanga...someone printed it out and gave it to them and now they are "concerned"...so now i have to go to these meetings and i cant go back to school til i get a drug test...i told my mom she wasnt making me go back there and shes not...im not going back there...i stand by everything i said...
ill write in this later its the only thing i have left now...

im am exteremely pissed off...today was not a good day...first my physics teacher looked at my bridge and he told me it was uneven and he took it apart and made me redue it...i was really mad becaus ei worked really hard on it just so it can be torn to peices...then during homeroom the dean came ot me and started yelling at me abou tmy pants and shoes...which i thought were apropriate because ive been wearing them since last year...then im told im on probation for fighting that happened over 3 months ago...i hate that fucking school with a passsion...i dont want to go back they are all fucking stupid cunts...

well on the plus side nicks coming over after work...my mom isnt to pleased...but o well like this kid said yesterday to me it doesnt matter what anyone else says long as im happy...and i am..things are going alot better for me with the whole friend situation...kurt imed me yesterday and he was are you at jims i said no and we were talking and i made a comment and he ssaid i dont have a problem with you so i guess he doesnt but i have this gut feeling that everyones going to start disliking me and i hope that doesnt happen...

i felt bad for nick yesterday i made this comment on how i feel as though they may like me now but in weeks to come they might dislike me ya know...and he was all like i hope im not ruining your friendship...and i was like your not...and that i like him and no one can change that...dont feel that way love things will turn out ok...

last nighti talked to someone i never thought id have a conversation with...he was nice and kind and definitly not a prick...when i first was intriduced to him i thought he was cute...but i thought he didnt like me because of unmentioned reasons...but turns out he just thinks im crazy and smoke too much...but o well i hope to talk to him again...

<3...hope your day was better then mine

well i was in 4a today and i was tralking to christina and i had mentionted how i heard that jennifer wasnt coming back to francis...and i told her i excited i was and then how i seen her walking to school and how it made me so mad...so she told me jennifer was going to be homeschooled and she has been in school but leaving early...she also heard that jennifer and camacho got married but i talked to shannon and shannon told me that her a camacho kicked it before...how jennifer stays with a lying and cheating person is beyond me...and how camacho stays with a lying slut is beyond me...and why shannon would want to get involed in that is beyond me...well i dont know...and who the fuck cares...

im going to see if i can get a job today at puccis...i need one but i refuse to give money to my momm for bills...its just not fair...id make that money so i dont have to ask her for money anymore...but i know her to well...shes going to say pay this and pay that...and because i might work at her favorite pizza place shes going to be like "bring home some pizza"  fuck that...

i started building my bridge its awesome...i have the most done so far in the class...i cant wait to finish it its going to be rockin!!!!  i worked on my clay person today i gave her a butt but it is covered by her long and beautiful hair...after it dryes im going to paint it i think im going to give her a skirt so it looks like sally from the nightmare before christmas...because her hair looks like her thus far...

i got a letter today that said i have to bring my academic intervention papers in but im still not doing it...i know i can do well...this time im applying myself...so im not going to do bad...so im not doing that stupid after school shit...i refuse to...

i have a saturday this saturday and i dont wanna serve it but ill get suspended again...shit i hat that school...

john told me to call him today and i was like why he said he has to ask me something and ive been thinking about it since he told me...i wonder what i could be?  is it good or bad?  i have no clue but id like to know but knowing me ill forget to call him and ill never know...lol

today was a very intersting and fun day...allie picked me up and bought me dinner...i had steak tacos with rice and beans...good...then we went to riques and smoked...so im am extremely high right now...i had a blast...its fun because rique is a funny guy...he just does little stupid shit to make even the saddest person happy...thats what he did today...allie was pissed for reasons unmentioned and rique was just cracking jokes left and right...made her smile alot...anywho then we went to wendys and i got a frosty...i wanted a strwberry milkshake but she said it was too far...then she dropped me off and now im here...

i have to go to school tomorrow...i kinda want to to finish my clay person...its going to be rockin!!!

<3

well i woke up 10 after 8 to a phone call saying "im gonna smoke this bowl buto will you open the door?" so i got up and opened the door and then smoked with charles and thats when i decided i didnt wan to go to school...so when my mom called she asked "did you leave yet?" i said "no" then she said "why not" i said "because i dont wanna go" so she bitched alittle and then called me off..i dont feel good either johnny is home sick so i there might be a slight chance im getting was hes got...

after i smoked i made myself some breakfast and started watching the O.C...again...i love seth cohen!!! hes awesome...i took a a little break form watching it though to make hot cocoa...with marshmellows...when i think of marshmellows i think of camacho...because jennifer called him that...and i remember how pissed she got the day he told her he thought i was cute...well she told me he said that but she could have been lying...im not too sure...

something was said today that (i am not going to mention what it was) i really didnt like...it was a very sexual comment that made me mad so i left...and then he called me and was like "im sorry i came at you like that i will never come at you like that again"...i said ok and i havent talked to him since...im kinda still made because i think he definitly was in the wrong...

well im off to watch the O.C...agian...soo tata...

I <3 allie!

well today was a very interesting day...two chicks in school today got into a figh...it was great...erica beat the shit out of brandy...possibly might even have broken brandys nose...it was great...there was blood everywhere...

i started going to my neww classes and as i walked into art 1 yesterday i noticed i wasnt the only upper classmen there...he walked in and i noticed him but i didnt rreally look at him...but when i went to go sit down i noticed jose sitting at the table kiddy corner from me...i was like "great"...i talk to him and what not but tony said that hes an asshole...i dont believe him and i dont think jocse is an asshole...but i think the only reaso he thinks that is because he hurt me...i know that wasnt his intentions but shit happens...

i feel bad...johns gf broke up  with him and he came to talk to me about it...i knew form the begining that he had a gf so i didnt bother with him...i mean id talk to him but i saw him as just a friend...but now that she broke up with him i think he thinks he has a chance...but he doesnt...im supposed to practice honesty for theology...and honestly i dont like him...im content being his friend but he always brings things up like "ive liked you for so long" and "can i have a kiss oin the cheek"...it makes me very uncomfortable...and sometimes i wish he would leave me alone...but wishes dont come true and i dont have the balls to tell him i dont like him...so im stuck in this situation...

well yesterday i smoked with jamie and charles...i was extremely high...and then nick came over and we watched eurotrip...i fell asleep...i was really tired...and then nick left...i then was screaming at my mom because she should me a side of her i never thought i would see...but lets just say...im not doing it make things harder on her...im doing it for me...its my life...and my happiness...no one can stop me now...im happy and like jose said its about time and he right it is about time...the only sad part is him leaving...

well yeterday started off bad...he is a jerk in general...and he knows just how to get on my nerves...congratulations...but then nick picked me up and everything seemed to be going great...we went to the movies...saw white noise...i liked it and it scared me somewhat...then we went back to nicks and i stayed there...it was the scariest thing in the world...nick didnt tell his mom i was staying so when she came in his room at 6:30 in the morning and started talking to nick...my eyes were wide open just starring at her in the dark...she was talking to him and he started to answer but was still half asleep so when she continued to call his name he didnt say anything...so she came up to the bed and hit nick but instead of it being nick it was me...so then she went to hit nick again and she did but then she was like who is in the bed with you...she asked him if he had a girl in his bed and that was my cue...i got up and was like hi im jenna...noce to meet you...she ssaid i was cute and i think she is very pretty herself...

i dont undersatnd somethings...if im so beautiful and pretty...then why do people insist on waiting to tell me...i would really like it if people would start letting me in on these things...i mean...i hear it all the time but its from parents and friends...and for the past few days ive been told im beautiful and that im really pretty and that everyone wants me but they felt this way for a long time and are now just telling me...if i knew then what i know now...id be happy...alot happier...

well im at jimmys now and im doing nothing...i fell alseep for a bit and it was really hard for me to wake up...i kept hearing people walk up and down the stairs but i couldnt open my eyes...i was getting scared...but then i just got up and found my way upstairs...

im very proud of myself...as much as i love smoking the past few days i havent been doing it...yesterday i smoked a little bit and today nothing at all...im not feeling well though...i know why but im not going to say it here...you all will think its all in my head...but im extremely proud of myself because ive only had 3 cigarettes since new years...i  glad im trying to quit its a bad habbit...

"Breaking hearts has never looked so cool as when you wrap your car around a tree.
Your makeup looks great next to his teeth."

"Love is like the truth, sometimes it prevails, sometimes it hurts."

"Where ever I go, whatever I do, I carry a little part of you with me right here in the center of my heart."(jose)

<3

its a game...i just play it to play it...


I'm always his friend... Never his girl...

i went to school today...it was ok...got my schedule changed finally...i have art and bussiness math now...i had to drop spanish 2...i really didnt want to because i like my teacher...but i had to to make my schedule work...

im at jimmys...allies sleeping...watching tv...on the computer...same shit different day...but i enjoy doing this everyday...its fun...i was surprised even thought we got into a fight and he told me that when we smoked if it was his weed he was going to tell me i couldnt smoke...but today when we smoked i asked jimmy whos weed it was and he said kurts...i feel horrible...i was really mean...i mean im being nice now because i dont want to be a bitch but thats to late...im thinking of apologizing but id be caving in...and i dont want to do that...i must stay strong...lol!   anywho...i made jimmy and me and kurt and dave hot cocoa...it was excellent...it had the works...marshmellows and whipped cream...mmm...im such a nice person but i get treated like shit...even though we had a fight im still going to treat him with the respect he deserves...thats what i do...i make others happy befroe myself...

-a geart love?
  its when you shed tears for him but still you care for him...its when he ignored you but you still longed for him...its when ho startsvto love another and yet you manage a smile and find the courage to say "im happy for you"

-i may seldom tell you how much you mean to me...oi may not be able to reach you because maybe we are both busy but in spite of all this i want oyu to know that i really love you...

-just wondering would you smile if i smiled at you?..would you say hello if i greeted you?..would you talk to me if i talked to you?..would you add the word "too" if i said "i love you?"

i have the words to say it
but icould never say it to you
distance kills as lives do
and sadky you dont care
if you only knew 
how i adore you
your dark shining eyes
your fuzzy brown hair
that goofy smile
if you only knew
how i adore you
your gentle touch
your subtle nidge
that way you held my hand
if you only knew
how i adore you
your frequent denial
your sudden silence
that game you seem to play
if you only knew
how i dispise you
youll notice me one moment
youll ignore me the next
it hurts me so
when i dont know
what i am to you
if you only knew
how i despise you
so please tell me
please let mr know
if you dont care
ill try to let go
if you only knew how i adore you

turns out francis didnt have school today...jason said they were there for like 10 mins and then got to go home...but what sucks is that they used yesterday and today as my suspension days and im not sure whats going to happen because of the snow day...so i hope i can go to school tomorrow to make my mother proud...

i want to smoke i have some weed but i dont know if i can smoke it yet...its half nicks...i should call him...but i think its too early...im not sure if he has work or not so i dont know if i should...he told kyle who told allie that me and him are going out...thats news to me...i have no clue whats going on...id like to know but im not going to be a bother by asking him everytime i see him i asked him once and i got no reply so maybe i should just keep quiet and let things just take its way...

I'm in my own little world now doing whatever i please and you...you wont stop me at all...im greater and better then youll ever be just know that...just know that...

it saddens me to say that the past few days were really fucked up...hectic and miserable...things were said that really hurt but im sure i said hurtful things back...but does it matter...no...i know how he feels and vice versa...

i also feel angered by the decision one has made...is it right?  what purpose does it serve you?  are you happy?  thats all that matters is that your happy...because im not and from the looks of it...i never will...

I'm in my own little world now doing whatever i please and you...you cant stop me at all...im nicer and lovelier then youll ever be just know that...just know that...

today i got suspended from school...for the gayest reason ever...i didnt serve a saturday...and then my mom kept ranting and raving about school and how shes disappointed in me and all the good stuff...she mentioned it to allie and then they talked about it...i told her to shut up and that she talked to much...

kyle and nick came over and we watched tv and smoked like usual...then i was making hot chocalate when he imed me and said "is everyone talking shit about me now over there?"  i was like no because we werent...i finally told him what i was going to say and then apologized for it...i still stand by what i said but what i said about her i was out of line...

mondays suck...tuesdays suck...wednesday is the middle of the week...thursday sucks...the weekend baby!!!!
it rocks my world...
